summary: This is a brief email chain from December 2018 discussing a request to touch base regarding lawmakers calling on the Department of Justice to explain the Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) given to Jeffrey Epstein. The emails contain a link to a news article on the topic.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) that lawmakers are demanding an explanation for from the DOJ.

events.title: Lawmakers Call for DOJ Probe into Epstein NPA
events.description: Various lawmakers call on the Department of Justice to explain the Non-Prosecution Agreement given to Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The email chain is dated December 6-7, 2018.
The subject is lawmakers demanding an investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's 'sweetheart' Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA).
The email includes a link to an NBC News article titled 'Lawmakers demand probe into sex offender Jeffrey Epstein's sweetheart deal'.
The correspondence shows coordination to discuss the political and legal fallout regarding the Epstein NPA.
